wikitext.*:
'''Keith James Ferguson''' ([[26 February|February 26]], [[1972]]) is an American voice actor, best known as the voice of Bloo in ''[[References to The Lord of the Rings#Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends|Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends]]''.

He provided the voice of Morgomir in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]''.
